EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2013.2 - Submit Session Ideas
EmailTemplate.subject: Submit Session Ideas for TriCON Annual Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
TriCON Annual Training presents ideas and insight from some of the best minds in public safety -- YOU! We're looking for clients to present best practices using TriTech products, leadership insights, or general lessons learned in your agency.
Don't want to present? We still want your input and ideas for informative session topics - TriCON is developed just for you and we want to make it as valuable and educational as possible.
Help us develop a training program designed just for you and submit your session ideas for TriCON.
<mailto:tricon@tritech.com>
"Like" the TriCON Facebook Page <http://www.facebook.com/pages/TriCON/217186504986544> for event photos and updates on 2013 TriCON Annual Training plans. Training Details Dates (9/29-10/2):
Make your travel plans to participate in all the sessions and networking events.
Click here for the schedule <http://www.tritech.com/news/tricon/tricon-agenda>
Location:
Hilton San Diego Bayfront <http://www.hiltonsandiegobayfront.com>
San Diego, CA 92101
$199 / night discounted rate
Registration:
$695: Early bird registration (Before Aug. 1)
Additional discounts available
